General.Name: The Tinley Beverage Company Inc
General.Description: The Tinley Beverage Company Inc. manufactures and sells liquor-inspired, non-alcoholic, and cannabis-infused beverages in the United States and Canada. The company offers sparkling, single-serve tonics and multi-serve elixirs beverages under Tinley's brand. The company was formerly known as Quia Resources Inc. and changed its name to The Tinley Beverage Company Inc. in October 2015. The Tinley Beverage Company Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 77 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5K 1H1
